Body:
plt.subplot(3, 1, 1)
if title is not None:
    plt.title(title)
plt.scatter(np.arange(len(outtab)) + 1, (outtab['flux_fit'] - outtab[
    'flux_0']) * 100.0 / outtab['flux_0'])
plt.axhline(0, ls='--', c='k')
plt.ylabel('fluxperc')
plt.xlim(0.5, len(outtab) + 0.5)
plt.subplot(3, 1, 2)
plt.scatter(np.arange(len(outtab)) + 1, outtab['x_fit'] - outtab['x_0'])
plt.axhline(0, ls='--', c='k')
plt.ylabel('dx')
plt.xlim(0.5, len(outtab) + 0.5)
plt.subplot(3, 1, 3)
plt.scatter(np.arange(len(outtab)) + 1, outtab['y_fit'] - outtab['y_0'])
plt.axhline(0, ls='--', c='k')
plt.ylabel('dy')
plt.xlim(0.5, len(outtab) + 0.5)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
